name: SACRIFEATURE
description:
[The game was made to play in 1920x1080px]

SACRIFEATURE

Sacrifeature is a little ( buggy)arena-shooter, but at the beginning of each game you have to choose wich abilities you are going to play with.

This prototype is my entry for the ludum dare 43, in Compo category (made alone in 48H) !
The theme is "Sacrifice Must be Made".

HOW TO PLAY ?
- Move with Q and D- Jump with Space- Aim and shoot with the left click of the mouse.

ADVICES :
- Last unlock is at 80 pts
- Be carefull went you choose your abilities, avoid clicking too fast or too much times, there is a lot of bugs :(
- Sound checkbox doesn't work
- There may be a score display bug.

LOGS :
03/12 : Fixed a score bug that prevented unlocking all items.

I hope you'll like it !
